profile.name: Maxime Ryckebusch
profile.title: Systems and Network Administrator
profile.subtitle: Sociable and dynamic IT technician, specialized in systems and networks with solid training in cybersecurity.
profile.Paragraph1: My name is Maxime and I am 21 years old. Passionate about IT, I have explored various fields by learning and practicing on my own in my spare time. Although my initial interest was in hardware and electronics, I gradually moved towards computer programming. My curiosity and attention to detail allow me to learn every day and constantly broaden my knowledge.
profile.Paragraph2: Today I am able to develop in Java, C++, C#, Python, HTML, CSS, JavaScript/TypeScript, and to carry out web development with React and Vue.js. In addition, I manage and maintain a self-hosted infrastructure, mainly composed of Docker containers and a NAS server, which allows me to host different services, isolate them and experiment with various technologies.
profile.Paragraph3: For several years, due to my interest in animation, particularly Japanese animation, I have been interested in how audiovisual content is produced and distributed. I first learned the art of subtitling (translation, timing, typesetting) with Aegisub, in order to best integrate French into Japanese works. Later, I became interested in encoding, then in video filtering with VapourSynth, two fields that arouse my curiosity and passion.
profile.Paragraph4: In this portfolio you will find my educational and professional background, the skills I possess, my interests, some of my projects, my extracurricular activities, as well as the various ways to contact me. I wish you an excellent reading!

extras.title: Extracurricular Activities
extras.subtitle: Subtitling, encoding and video optimization
extras.description: During my experiences in timecoding and subtitle adaptation, I learned to master professional tools such as Aegisub, Photoshop and Illustrator, which allowed me to precisely manage the synchronization, formatting and visual design of subtitles. I also acquired technical skills in optimizing video files with codecs such as x265 or AV1, in order to ensure maximum quality while reducing file size. These activities developed my creativity in visual and typographic processing, while strengthening my rigor and technical mastery, qualities essential for carrying out complex and demanding projects.
